thread.title: "Filth! You're stupid b***hes": Kim Woodburn EXPLODES at Nicola McLean and Bianca Gasgoigne during heated CBB row
thread.title_full: "Filth! You're stupid b***hes": Kim Woodburn EXPLODES at Nicola McLean and Bianca Gasgoigne during heated CBB row

author: Lara Martin
title: "Filth! You're stupid b***hes": Kim Woodburn EXPLODES at Nicola McLean and Bianca Gasgoigne during heated CBB row
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Kim Woodburn has EXPLODED at Nicola McLean in the Celebrity Big Brother house once again, branding her a “nasty piece of work” and a “stupid b***h”. 
The How Clean Is Your House star, 74, lost her cool with model Nicola, 35, and unleashed a torrent of fury against her when the Celebrity Big Brother Awards went very wrong on Wednesday. 
Kim raged: “You really are a nasty piece of work and I don’t know why the hell you are. You want to pick on Kim? Don’t you bother. I had hoped we had a little something here but you’re a nasty b***h of a girl, you’re a saddo. Don’t start with me, you haven’t got the strength." Kim exploded at Nicola tonight (Photo: Channel 5) Nicola remained silent as Kim screamed at her (Photo: Channel 5) 
Then, addressing Nicola and Bianca Gascoigne , she said: “You silly b***ches. You stupid b***ches. You start on me, I’ll start on you. You don’t like it do you? Tough!” 
Big Brother then called Kim to the Diary Room where she continued to rant about Nicola, saying: “I don’t want trouble but Nicola thrives on it, there’s something wrong with her.” 
The trouble all started when the housemates were shown clips of things they’d all said about each other in the house - it led Bianca to see Kim’s remark about Jamie O’Hara being an “adulterer.” 
Bianca was furious and Nicola backed her up. Nicola refused to retaliate (Photo: Channel 5) Kim called Nicola "filth" (Photo: Channel 5) 
Nicola told Kim it wasn’t cool to bring up someone’s past in the house, while Bianca said: “That was uncalled for and a little bit below the belt, shall we say.” 
Kim, however, stood her ground, shouting at Bianca: “Your boyfriend two-timed his wife with three children. Saying he had to pay his wife a lot of money and he shouldn’t have to.” 
She then branded Nicola “dirty” and said: “[I heard Jamie say] that his wife was getting too much money off him and [Nicola] turned around and said, ‘That’s what she married him for.’ You don’t know why she married him, you have no right to stir the pot. It was cruel of you.” 
Nicola said: “I was at their wedding, Kim.” 
“Filth!” shouted Kim. Bianca was unhappy about Kim's comment about Jamie Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
